content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft spruce_door I need to craft 2 spruce_planks, which require 1 spruce_wood each. I will start by moving 1 spruce_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I have crafted the first spruce_planks, but they are blocking the crafting grid. I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft spruce_door, I first need to craft spruce_planks. To craft spruce_planks, I need to place a spruce_wood in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the spruce_wood from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the spruce_planks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a spruce_door, I need to place 3 spruce_planks vertically and horizontally in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the first spruce_plank from slot 11 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Since the first spruce_plank is already placed in slot 1, I will now move the second spruce_plank to slot 2 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: The first row of spruce_planks is complete, so I will now move the third spruce_plank to slot 4 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: The first row of spruce_planks is complete, so I will now move the fourth spruce_plank to slot 5 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: The first two rows of spruce_planks are complete, so I will now move the fifth spruce_plank to slot 7 in the crafting table.
Ok

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_door
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_door", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: I have now completed the recipe for the spruce_door, so I will move the resulting 3 spruce_doors from the crafting table to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
